author: taylor
msg: Added getUserId() convenience method to JetspeedRunData
* Get the user id for the current user.
* This method is provided as an abstraction to the very implementation
* specific method of retrieving user ids in Turbine.

author: taylor
msg: restricted access to role psml if not logged on
this feature will be enhanced with security roles checks

author: taylor
msg: NOTE: Im not sure of the new JetspeedLink behavior, so Im still using the deprecated JetspeedTemplateLink

author: taylor
msg: Fixed bug where the layout for a psml file had portletsets of portletsets under a card/tab controller.
setPanel() was not finding the correct pane.
NOTE: in order for this to work, the tabbed portletsets must be given names
NOTE: tried to fix this for JetspeedLink, but this method (setPanel) is not supported.
